verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> ve-Zot likewise הַמִּצְוָ֗ה <WH4687> ham-mitz-Vah, Now these [are] the commandments הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> ha-chuk-Kim the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim, and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֛ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God לְלַמֵּ֣ד <WH3925> le-lam-Med to teach אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot you that ye might do בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, [them] in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> 'oe-Rim whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> le-rish-Tah. to possess

לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so תִּירָ֜א <WH3372> ti-Ra That thou mightest fear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לִ֠שְׁמֹר <WH8104> Lish-mor to keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חֻקֹּתָ֣יו <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tav all his statutes וּמִצְוֹתָיו֮ <WH4687> u-mitz-vo-Tav and his commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּךָ֒ <WH6680> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah you וּבִנְךָ֣ <WH1121> u-vin-Cha thee thou and thy son וּבֶן־ <WH1121> u-ven- and thy son's בִּנְךָ֔ <WH1121> bin-Cha, son כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <WH2416> chai-Yei-cha; of thy life וּלְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> u-le-Ma-'an so יַאֲרִכֻ֥ן <WH748> ya-'a-ri-Chun may be prolonged יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3117> ya-Mei-cha. and that thy days

וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <WH8085> ve-sha-ma'-Ta Hear יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El therefore O Israel וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> ve-sha-mar-Ta and observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot, to do אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher that יִיטַ֣ב <WH3190> yi-Tav [it] that it may be well לְךָ֔ le-Cha, וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher after תִּרְבּ֖וּן <WH7235> tir-Bun with thee and that ye may increase מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; mightily כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath promised יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tei-cha of thy fathers לָ֔ךְ Lach, אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz thee in the land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> za-Vat that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> u-de-Vash. and honey פ Peh

שְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; O Israel יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God יְהוָ֥ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad [is] one

וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <WH157> ve-'A-hav-ta, And thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all לְבָבְךָ֥ <WH3824> le-va-ve-Cha with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> naf-she-Cha and with all thy soul וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all מְאֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3966> me-'o-De-cha. and with all thy might

וְהָי֞וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim And these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, These אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom thee this day עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3824> le-va-Ve-cha. shall be in thine heart

וְשִׁנַּנְתָּ֣ם <WH8150> ve-shin-nan-Tam And thou shalt teach them diligently לְבָנֶ֔יךָ <WH1121> le-va-Nei-cha, unto thy children וְדִבַּרְתָּ֖ <WH1696> ve-dib-bar-Ta and shalt talk בָּ֑ם Bam; בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֤ <WH3427> be-shiv-te-Cha of them when thou sittest בְּבֵיתֶ֙ךָ֙ <WH1004> be-vei-Te-cha in thine house וּבְלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <WH1980> u-ve-lech-te-Cha walk בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> vad-De-rech, by the way וּֽבְשָׁכְבְּךָ֖ <WH7901> u-ve-sha-che-be-Cha and when thou liest down וּבְקוּמֶֽךָ׃ <WH6965> u-ve-ku-Me-cha. and when thou risest up

וּקְשַׁרְתָּ֥ם <WH7194> u-ke-shar-Tam And thou shalt bind לְא֖וֹת <WH226> le-'ot them for a sign עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> ya-De-cha; upon thine hand וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu shall be as לְטֹטָפֹ֖ת <WH2903> le-to-ta-Fot and they shall be as frontlets בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein among עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha. between thine eyes

וּכְתַבְתָּ֛ם <WH3789> u-che-tav-Tam And thou shalt write עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on מְזוּזֹ֥ת <WH4201> me-zu-Zot them upon the posts בֵּיתֶ֖ךָ <WH1004> bei-Te-cha of thy house וּבִשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8179> u-vish-'a-Rei-cha. and on thy gates ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah shall come כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki when יְבִיאֲךָ֣׀ <WH935> ye-vi-'a-Cha shall have brought יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And it shall be when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz thee into the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> u-le-ya-'a-Ko and to Jacob לָ֣תֶת <WH5414> La-tet to give לָ֑ךְ Lach; עָרִ֛ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot thee great וְטֹבֹ֖ת <WH2896> ve-to-Vot and goodly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not בָנִֽיתָ׃ <WH1129> va-Ni-ta. which thou buildedst

וּבָ֨תִּ֜ים <WH1004> u-Vat-Tim And houses מְלֵאִ֣ים <WH4392> me-le-'Im full כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all טוּב֮ <WH2898> tuv of all good אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not מִלֵּאתָ֒ <WH4390> mil-le-Ta [things] which thou filledst וּבֹרֹ֤ת <WH953> u-vo-Rot not and wells חֲצוּבִים֙ <WH2672> cha-tzu-Vim digged אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not חָצַ֔בְתָּ <WH2672> cha-Tzav-ta, which thou diggedst כְּרָמִ֥ים <WH3754> ke-ra-Mim not vineyards וְזֵיתִ֖ים <WH2132> ve-zei-Tim and olive trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not נָטָ֑עְתָּ <WH5193> na-Ta-'e-ta; which thou plantedst וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <WH398> ve-'a-chal-Ta not when thou shalt have eaten וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH7646> ve-sa-Va-'e-ta. and be full

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> hish-Sha-mer [Then] beware לְךָ֔ le-Cha, פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- not תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> tish-Kach lest thou forget אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֛ <WH3318> ho-tzi-'a-Cha which brought thee forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> mib-Beit from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dim. of bondage

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> ti-Ra Thou shalt fear וְאֹת֣וֹ <WH853> ve-'o-To תַעֲבֹ֑ד <WH5647> ta-'a-Vod; and serve וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> u-vish-Mo by his name תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <WH7650> tish-sha-Ve-a'. him and shalt swear

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תֵֽלְכ֔וּן <WH1980> te-le-Chun, along אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> 'a-che-Rim; other מֵאֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> me-'e-lo-Hei of the gods הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, of the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5439> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem. which [are] round about

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אֵ֥ל <WH410> 'el God קַנָּ֛א <WH7067> kan-Na [is] a jealous יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh (For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> be-kir-Be-cha; among פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- otherwise יֶ֠חֱרֶה <WH2734> Ye-che-reh be kindled אַף־ <WH639> 'af- you) lest the anger יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בָּ֔ךְ Bach, וְהִשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <WH8045> ve-hish-Mi-de-cha, against thee and destroy מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei thee from off the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah. of the earth ס sa-Mek

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תְנַסּ֔וּ <WH5254> te-nas-Su, Ye shall not tempt אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after נִסִּיתֶ֖ם <WH5254> nis-si-Tem as ye tempted בַּמַּסָּֽה׃ <WH4532> bam-mas-Sah. [him] in Massah

שָׁמ֣וֹר <WH8104> sha-Mor Ye shall diligently תִּשְׁמְר֔וּן <WH8104> tish-me-Run, keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> mitz-Vot the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God וְעֵדֹתָ֥יו <WH5713> ve-'e-do-Tav and his testimonies וְחֻקָּ֖יו <WH2706> ve-chuk-Kav and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוָּֽךְ׃ <WH6680> tziv-Vach. which he hath commanded

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> hai-ya-Shar [that which is] right וְהַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> ve-hat-Tov and good בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an that it יִ֣יטַב <WH3190> Yi-tav that it may be well לָ֔ךְ Lach, וּבָ֗אתָ <WH935> u-Va-ta, with thee and that thou mayest go in וְיָֽרַשְׁתָּ֙ <WH3423> ve-ya-rash-Ta and possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz land הַטֹּבָ֔ה <WH2896> hat-to-Vah, the good אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha. unto thy fathers

לַהֲדֹ֥ף <WH1920> la-ha-Dof To cast out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> mip-pa-Nei-cha; from before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. thee as the LORD ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- When יִשְׁאָלְךָ֥ <WH7592> yish-'a-le-Cha asketh בִנְךָ֛ <WH1121> vin-Cha [And] when thy son מָחָ֖ר <WH4279> ma-Char thee in time to come לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying מָ֣ה <WH4100> mah What הָעֵדֹ֗ת <WH5713> ha-'e-Dot, What [mean] the testimonies וְהַֽחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> ve-ha-chuk-Kim and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim, and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֛ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah hath commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta Then thou shalt say לְבִנְךָ֔ <WH1121> le-vin-Cha, unto thy son עֲבָדִ֛ים <WH5650> 'a-va-Dim bondmen הָיִ֥ינוּ <WH1961> ha-Yi-nu become לְפַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> le-far-'Oh We were Pharaoh's בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֧נוּ <WH3318> vai-yo-tzi-'E-nu brought us out יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt בְּיָ֥ד <WH3027> be-Yad hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <WH2389> cha-za-Kah. with a mighty

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten shewed יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אוֹתֹ֣ת <WH226> o-Tot signs וּ֠מֹפְתִים <WH4159> U-mo-fe-tim and wonders גְּדֹלִ֨ים <WH1419> ge-do-Lim great וְרָעִ֧ים׀ <WH7451> ve-ra-'Im and sore בְּמִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim upon Egypt בְּפַרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> be-far-'Oh upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol and all בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> bei-To and upon all his household לְעֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei-nu. before our eyes

וְאוֹתָ֖נוּ <WH853> ve-'o-Ta-nu הוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> ho-Tzi And he brought us out מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> mish-Sham; there לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an order הָבִ֣יא <WH935> ha-Vi from thence that he might bring us in אֹתָ֔נוּ <WH853> 'o-Ta-nu, לָ֤תֶת <WH5414> La-tet to give לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, us the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' which he sware לַאֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1> la-'a-vo-Tei-nu. unto our fathers
